meanings.definition: A common weed with purple flowers.
meanings.sent1: The henbit grew wild in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I pulled out the henbit from the flower bed.
meanings.sent3: The henbit seemed to dance in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The field was a sea of purple, a henbit paradise.
meanings.sent5: The henbit's vibrant color brightened the dull yard.

meanings.sent1: Stop trying to henbit me with your constant questions.
meanings.sent2: She henbits her brother by always borrowing his things.
meanings.sent3: The persistent henbitting by the salesperson made me leave the store.
meanings.sent4: The buzzing mosquito henbit my arm all night long.
meanings.sent5: The teasing henbit of the class clown made everyone laugh.
